nodes.text: Tokare Garrison was a Galactic Republic military base on Dantooine. Named in honor of the Jedi Master Vandar Tokare, who served on the Dantooine Jedi Enclave Council, the base served as a resupply point for Republic starships operating in the territory of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Republic's third war with them.
The base was used by Republic forces as center of operations against the Imperial soldiers and Nova Blades during the Dantooine Incursion.
